# R package GaussSuppression

| [GaussSuppression on CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=GaussSuppression) |     | [pkgdown website](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/) |     | [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/statisticsnorway/ssb-gausssuppression) |
|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

------------------------------------------------------------------------

[![Mentioned in Awesome Official
Statistics](https://awesome.re/mentioned-badge.svg)](http://www.awesomeofficialstatistics.org)

## R-package to protect tables by suppression using the Gaussian elimination algorithm

A statistical disclosure control tool to protect tables by suppression
using the Gaussian elimination secondary suppression algorithm
[(Langsrud, 2024)](https://doi.org/10.1007%2F978-3-031-69651-0_6). A
suggestion is to start by working with functions
[SuppressSmallCounts()](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressSmallCounts.html)
and
[SuppressDominantCells()](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressDominantCells.html).
These functions use primary suppression functions for the minimum
frequency rule and the dominance rule, respectively. Novel functionality
for suppression of disclosive cells is also included. General primary
suppression functions can be supplied as input to the general working
horse function,
[GaussSuppressionFromData()](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/GaussSuppressionFromData.html).
Suppressed frequencies can be replaced by synthetic decimal numbers as
described in [Langsrud
(2019)](https://doi.org/10.1007%2Fs11222-018-9848-9).

------------------------------------------------------------------------

ðŸ“Œ See the [broader list of available
functions](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/index.html).

------------------------------------------------------------------------

See the package vignettes: [Magnitude table
suppression](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GaussSuppression/vignettes/Magnitude_table_suppression.html),
[Small count frequency table
suppression](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GaussSuppression/vignettes/Small_count_frequency_table_suppression.html),
[Defining tables for
GaussSuppression](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GaussSuppression/vignettes/define_tables.html).

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Installation

You can install GaussSuppression from CRAN with

``` r
install.packages("GaussSuppression")
```

Alternatively install from GitHub
by`devtools::install_github("statisticsnorway/ssb-gausssuppression")` if
you want to test the newest changes.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Official version on CRAN:
<https://cran.r-project.org/package=GaussSuppression>

# Package index

## All functions

- [`AdditionalSuppression()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/AdditionalSuppression.md)
  : GaussSuppression from data and suppressed data

- [`CandidatesDefault()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/CandidatesDefault.md)
  [`CandidatesNum()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/CandidatesDefault.md)
  : Candidates functions

- [`ChainedSuppression()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/ChainedSuppression.md)
  [`ChainedSuppressionHi()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/ChainedSuppression.md)
  [`ChainedSuppressionHi1()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/ChainedSuppression.md)
  : Repeated GaussSuppression with forwarding of previous results

- [`ComputeIntervals()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/ComputeIntervals.md)
  : Function for calculating intervals for suppressed tables.

- [`FindDominantCells()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/FindDominantCells.md)
  : Method for finding dominant cells according to (possibly multiple)
  n,k dominance rules.

- [`FixRiskyIntervals()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/FixRiskyIntervals.md)
  : New primary cells to fix risky intervals

- [`GaussSuppressDec()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/GaussSuppressDec.md)
  : Cell suppression with synthetic decimal numbers

- [`GaussSuppressionFromData()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/GaussSuppressionFromData.md)
  : Cell suppression from input data containing inner cells

- [`GaussSuppressionTwoWay()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/GaussSuppressionTwoWay.md)
  :

  Two-way iteration variant of `GaussSuppressionFromData`

- [`IntervalLimits()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/IntervalLimits.md)
  : Construct feasibility interval requirements

- [`KDisclosurePrimary()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/KDisclosurePrimary.md)
  : Construct primary suppressed difference matrix

- [`LazyLinkedTables()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/LazyLinkedTables.md)
  :

  Linked tables by full `GaussSuppressionFromData` iterations

- [`MagnitudeRule()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/MagnitudeRule.md)
  [`DominanceRule()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/MagnitudeRule.md)
  [`PPercentRule()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/MagnitudeRule.md)
  :

  Dominance `(n,k)` or p% rule for magnitude tables

- [`MaxContribution()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/MaxContribution.md)
  : Find major contributions to aggregates

- [`NContributorsRule()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/NContributorsRule.md)
  : Number of contributors suppression rule

- [`Ncontributors()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/Ncontributors.md)
  : Find the number of unique groups contributing to aggregates

- [`NcontributorsHolding()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/NcontributorsHolding.md)
  :

  `Ncontributors` with holding-indicator

- [`PackageSpecs()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PackageSpecs.md)
  : Function for viewing built-in GaussSuppression specs

- [`PrimaryDefault()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PrimaryDefault.md)
  : Default primary function

- [`PrimaryFromSuppressedData()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PrimaryFromSuppressedData.md)
  [`ForcedFromSuppressedData()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PrimaryFromSuppressedData.md)
  [`NotPrimaryFromSuppressedData()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PrimaryFromSuppressedData.md)
  :

  `primary` and `forced` from suppressed data

- [`PrimaryRemoveWg()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PrimaryRemoveWg.md)
  [`CandidatesNumWg()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PrimaryRemoveWg.md)
  [`ForcedWg()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/PrimaryRemoveWg.md)
  : Special functions for the avoidance of suppression

- [`SingletonDefault()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SingletonDefault.md)
  : Default singleton function

- [`SingletonUniqueContributor()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SingletonUniqueContributor.md)
  [`SingletonUniqueContributor0()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SingletonUniqueContributor.md)
  : Unique contributor singleton function

- [`SuppressDirectDisclosure()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressDirectDisclosure.md)
  : Suppression of directly-disclosive cells

- [`SuppressDominantCells()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressDominantCells.md)
  :

  Suppress magnitude tables using dominance `(n,k)` or p% rule for
  primary suppression.

- [`SuppressFewContributors()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressFewContributors.md)
  : Few contributors suppression

- [`SuppressKDisclosure()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressKDisclosure.md)
  : K-disclosure suppression

- [`SuppressLinkedTables()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressLinkedTables.md)
  : Consistent Suppression of Linked Tables

- [`SuppressSmallCounts()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressSmallCounts.md)
  : Small count frequency table suppression.

- [`SuppressionFromDecimals()`](https://statisticsnorway.github.io/ssb-gausssuppression/reference/SuppressionFromDecimals.md)
  : Cell suppression from synthetic decimal numbers
